description.narrative: To enhance livelihood resilience of pastoral and agro-pastoral communities in cross-border drought prone areas of selected countries and improve the capacity of the selected countries governments to respond promptly and effectively to an eligible crisis or emergency.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :IGAD – Audit committee | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than six (6) months following the EffectiveDate, establish – and thereafter maintain at all times during the implementation of the Project–a independent audit committee withfunctions, composition and resources satisfactory to the Association, to be responsible for inter alia addressing and followingthrough issues raised by both internal and external audit reports. | Due Date :18-Dec-2014

Finance Agreement :IGAD – Procurement specialist | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than two (2) months after theEffective Date, recruit a procurement specialist, with qualifications,experience and terms of reference satisfactory to theAssociation. | Due Date :18-Aug-2014

Finance Agreement :IGAD – Procurement training | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than three (3) months after theEffective Date, provide procurement training to Recipient's procurement staff and members of Recipient's procurement Committee, ina manner and under terms of reference acceptable to the Association. | Due Date :18-Sep-2014

Finance Agreement :IGAD – Project accountant | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than three (3) months following theEffective Date, recruit an accountant for the Project under terms of reference, and with qualifications and experience satisfactoryto the Association, in accordance with the provisions of SectionIII of Schedule 2 to this Agreement. | Due Date :18-Sep-2014

Finance Agreement :Kenya - Internal auditor | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than six (6) months after the EffectiveDate, designate - or cause each Participating County to designate - an internal auditor for the respective Participating Countywith qualifications and experience and under the terms of reference satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :18-Dec-2014

Finance Agreement :Kenya - Management Information System | Description :The Recipient shall not later than six (6) months after theEffective Date have in place a computerized financial management systemfor the Project in a manner acceptable to the Association. |Due Date :18-Dec-2014

Finance Agreement :Kenya - Operations Manual | Description :Recipient shall: (a) no later than twelve (12) months after EffectiveDate prepare and furnish to the Association for its review and approval, an operations manual which shall set forth detailedimplementation arrangements for the IRM Part. | Due Date :18-Jun-2015

Finance Agreement :Uganda - Procurement Specialist | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than one (1) month after theEffective Date, recruit a procurement specialist, with qualifications, experience and terms of reference satisfactory to theAssociation. | Due Date :18-Aug-2014

Finance Agreement :Uganda – Civil engineer | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than six (6) months after the EffectiveDate, recruit a civil engineer to be responsible for inter alia verifying the contractors payments during contract execution. |Due Date :19-Jan-2015

Finance Agreement :Uganda – Districts internal auditors | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than six (6) months afterthe Effective Date, designate - or cause each Participating District to designate - an internal auditor for the respectiveParticipating District with qualifications and experience and under the terms of reference satisfactory to the Association. | DueDate :19-Jan-2015

Finance Agreement :Uganda – Operations Manual | Description :The Recipient shall: (a) no later than twelve (12) months afterEffective Date prepare and furnish to the Association for its review and approval, an operations manual which shall set forthdetailed implementation arrangements for the IRM Part. | Due Date :20-Jul-2015

Finance Agreement :Uganda – Procurement training | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than six (6) months after theEffective Date, provide procurement Training for staff of procurement and disposal unit of the Ministry of Agriculture, AnimalIndustry and Fisheries, in a manner and under terms of reference acceptableto the Association. | Due Date :19-Jan-2015

Finance Agreement :Uganda – Project accountant | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than three (3) months after theEffective Date, recruit a Project accountant, in accordance with theprovisions of Section III of this Schedule, withqualifications, experience and terms of reference satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :20-Oct-2014

Finance Agreement :Uganda – Record keeping system | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than twelve (12) months after theEffective Date, update its procurement filing and record keeping system, in form and substance acceptable to the Association. | DueDate :18-Aug-2015
